title: Design, Supply and Installation of Steel Fabricated Flyover for Veyangoda Railway Crossing
decision_details: - Veyangoda Town is one of the major town in the Gampaha District and provides access to the Airport and the Free Trade Zone at Katunayake from various parts of the country. The railway line to the upcountry and Northern and Eastern Provinces crosses Veyangoda town. The proposal made by H.E. the President to construct a fly-over across the railway line at Veyangoda to overcome the present difficulties encountered by the public due to gate closures very often, was approved by the Cabinet.
